attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have no confidence in the entire government.
I do not just wish to replace the Primeminister because I feel that New Labour offers no candidates fit to lead.
I feel that the government will cause further irrepairable damage to our country over the next 2 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
